about_the_game:
❤ 【Game Overview】 ❤


Immerse yourself in this medium-length visual novel brimming with romance. The protagonist is a member of a special minority group. The game offers a story of his journey as he forges connections with his online friend, and gradually falls in love.
While this game unfolds in the same universe as our previous title "Black Box - The Shining Immortal", new players can still dive straight in without missing a beat. Set against the backdrop of a futuristic sci-fi world, this medium-length game unfolds within a vast world full of intrigue. Beautifully illustrated in pixel art, and a riveting soundtrack that sets the mood for this love story. The game's rich dialogue and introspective monologues are presented in a simple and easily understood manner.

❤ 【Characters】 ❤


❤ 【Key Features】 ❤

If you're a fan of an immersive atmosphere, heterosexual, romance with younger man, and yandere characters, with an added sprinkle of crime and suspense, You might like it.

❤ 【Estimated Playtime】 ❤

The length of gameplay varies based on each player's reading pace, typically ranges from 3 to 5 hours. A game streaming may take about 6 hours.

content_descriptors.notes: The game depicts fictional violence, crime, drug use, torture, murder, sexual incidents and persecutions of minors in a negative and discouraging way. However they are mildly expressed in text or indirect graphics.

short_description: Immerse yourself in a pixel-art AVG that blends love, crime, and romantic comedy. A story of a young man forges connections with his online friend, and gradually falls in love. If you're a fan of love story, yandere, and don't mind a touch of thrill and crime, you will greatly enjoy this game.
